duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage construction activities for projects, ensuring work/safety/quality programs are followed.
Oversee site construction to ensure projects follow designs, specifications, standards, budget, safety, and schedule requirements.
Complete project reports accurately and timely for each construction project(s) assigned.
Document incidents and participate in incident investigations as required.
Provide leadership for issue resolution during project construction and commissioning phases.
Collaborate with Company Safety Representatives to promote awareness and understanding of safety performance on projects.
Provide technical support to Project Manager during project design and pre-job meetings.
Manage deliverables with key internal and external stakeholders to ensure project goals are met.
Manage 3rd party contract craft inspection staff for each construction project.
Ensure Company environmental policies, safety standards, and federal/local regulations are followed by all construction and inspection personnel.
Coordinate the timely completion of project documentation and close out processes.
Monitor construction progress and initiate corrective action when the contractor deviates from project specifications, requirements, or schedule.

education_certification.credential: 6 to 10 years of experience and education (engineering discipline) in construction of oil or natural gas infrastructure projects.
